item.title: 奇货可居：佩里-梅尔林谈特朗普的尼克松震荡回声（播客）
item.description: 最近有很多人在谈论唐纳德-特朗普的经济政策与 20 世纪 70 年代初尼克松冲击之间的相似之处。当时，这位前总统让美元脱离金本位，征收高额关税，并迫使美联储放宽货币政策。这些举措引发了美国的滞胀，并动摇了全球货币秩序。现在，鉴于特朗普决心重新平衡美国与全球贸易伙伴的关系，并对美联储提出了批评，因此，美国的货币政策可能会发生变化。【原文：There’s been a lot of talk recently about parallels between Donald Trump’s economic policies and the Nixon Shock of the early 1970s. That was when the former president took the dollar off the gold standard, introduced hefty tariffs, and pressured the Federal Reserve to ease monetary policy. The moves sparked stagflation in the US and shook up the global monetary order. item.title: 英国央行曼恩称市场变化阻止她支持更多降息举措
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）表示，她的投票从大幅降息转为暂停降息，因为市场的急剧波动已经降低了借贷成本，并为金融条件提供了足够的宽松。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Catherine Mann said she flipped her vote from a bumper interest-rate cut to a pause because sharp moves on markets had lowered borrowing costs and provided enough easing of financial conditions.】

item.title: 辉瑞重返欧洲市场，加入创纪录的美国发行商大潮
item.description: 辉瑞公司七年来首次出售欧元债券，加入了创纪录的反向扬基债券发行热潮。【原文：Pfizer Inc. is selling its first euro bonds in seven years, joining a record spree of reverse Yankee bond issuance.】

item.title: 中国策略奏效，印度发出美国贸易立场更强硬的信号
item.description: 印度官员表示，与美国的贸易谈判仍在按部就班地进行，尽管有迹象表明，在中国蔑视美国总统唐纳德-特朗普之后，新德里在谈判中采取了更加强硬的态度。【原文：Indian officials said trade talks with the US remain on track, although there are signs that New Delhi is adopting a tougher approach in negotiations, following China’s defiance of US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: KDDI 将回购 27 亿美元股票，包括京瓷所持股份
item.description: KDDI 公司表示将回购价值高达 4000 亿日元（27 亿美元）的股票，丰田汽车公司和京瓷公司也将回购其股份。【原文：KDDI Corp. said it will buy back as much as ¥400 billion ($2.7 billion) worth of its shares, with Toyota Motor Corp. and Kyocera Corp. tendering their stakes.】

item.title: 中国股市因科技股盈利乐观情绪升温而上扬
item.description: 在主要科技公司公布财报之前，中国股市上涨，当代安佰利科技股份有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.【原文：Chinese shares rose before earnings announcements by key tech firms, with sentiment also boosted by a positive report on Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.’s offering.】

item.title: 越南总理下令打击贸易欺诈和假冒商品
item.description: 越南总理发誓要加大打击贸易欺诈、走私和假冒商品的力度，因为越南正努力解决长期以来在美国关税谈判中成为症结的问题。【原文：Vietnam’s prime minister vowed to step up the fight against trade fraud, smuggling and counterfeit goods, as the nation seeks to address longstanding issues that have proved a sticking point in US tariff negotiations.】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛在瑞士洗钱调查后支付 500 万美元
item.description: 瑞士监管机构 Finma 发现瑞士宝盛集团有限公司（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）存在与洗钱有关的严重过失，因此勒令其上缴 440 万瑞士法郎（520 万美元），其中包括可能非法获得的利润。【原文：Julius Baer Group Ltd. has been ordered to hand over 4.4 million Swiss francs ($5.2 million) including profits that may have been earned unlawfully, after the Swiss regulator Finma found serious failings related to money laundering.】

item.title: 融资成本增加，乐天再次亏损
item.description: 乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc.【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. reported its 19th straight quarterly loss after financing costs mounted and it sought to turn around its struggling wireless operations.】

item.title: 苹果合作伙伴鸿海淡化全年销售展望
item.description: 苹果公司和英伟达公司的主要合约制造商鸿海精密工业股份有限公司下调了全年收入增长指导，原因是美国对主要合作伙伴的贸易战带来的不确定性持续存在。【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., the main contract manufacturer for Apple Inc. and Nvidia Corp., cut its guidance for full-year revenue growth as prolonged uncertainties from US’s trade war against major partners persist.】

item.title: 阿托斯宣布重组，旨在重启销售增长
item.description: 陷入困境的法国 IT 集团 Atos SE 表示，在经历多年挫折后，公司将简化组织结构，削减开支，努力恢复增长。【原文：Atos SE said it will simplify its organization and cut expenses as the embattled French IT group works to return to growth after years of setbacks.】

item.title: 印度 NSE 结束简街交易调查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的证券交易所已经结束了对简街集团违规交易的调查，该集团是印度衍生品市场上最活跃的外国参与者之一。【原文：India’s largest stock exchange has closed an investigation into irregular trades by Jane Street Group, one of the most active foreign players in the country’s derivatives markets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非顶级运输公司与工会谈判避免罢工
item.description: 南非国有港口和铁路公司的最大工会正在与第三方仲裁人展开最后谈判，以解决工资纠纷，避免数千名工人可能举行的罢工。【原文：The biggest labor union at South Africa’s state-owned port and rail company are starting final talks with a third-party arbitrator to resolve a wage dispute and stave off a potential strike by thousands of workers.】

item.title: 中国百度计划将机器人出租车扩展到欧洲和土耳其
item.description: 百度公司正计划在欧洲和土耳其测试并最终推出自动驾驶打车服务Apollo Go，与越来越多的中国自动驾驶技术公司一道开始全球扩张。【原文：Baidu Inc. is planning to test and eventually launch autonomous ride-hailing service Apollo Go in Europe and Turkey, joining a growing number of Chinese self-driving technology companies in embarking on a global expansion.】

item.title: 贸易冲击仍在持续，泰国央行暂缓降息预期
item.description: 泰国央行压低了为应对日益恶化的经济增长前景而进行更多降息的预期，官员们表示，他们需要保留有限的政策空间，以防范未来全球贸易战带来的冲击。【原文：Thailand’s central bank tamped down on expectations of more rate cuts to deal with a worsening growth outlook, with officials saying they need to preserve the limited policy space to guard against future shocks stemming from a global trade war.】

item.description: 德国房地产贷款公司 Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG 表示，由于美国政局不稳定，该公司已对其美国业务进行审查。【原文：German real estate lender Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG said it has put its US business under review as a result of the country’s lack of political stability.】

item.title: 中国企业在市场动荡中求助于银行贷款
item.description: 在市场不确定的情况下，中国企业正倾向于将银行贷款作为替代资金来源，以降低成本。【原文：Chinese companies are favoring bank loans as an alternate source of funding, as they seek to lower costs amid market uncertainty.】

item.title: 法院称瑞士信贷银行家不应被剥夺奖金
item.description: 瑞士一家法院在一项判决中称，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）收购其倒闭的竞争对手瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse）时，十几名前瑞士信贷银行家的奖金被非法剥夺，这一判决可能会为数百名员工就未支付赔偿金提起新的诉讼铺平道路。【原文：A dozen former Credit Suisse bankers were unlawfully stripped off their bonuses when UBS Group AG bought its collapsing rival, a Swiss court said in a verdict that could pave the way for fresh lawsuits from hundreds more employees over unpaid compensation.】

Ltd. is guiding to price its Hong Kong share sale at the top end it had earlier indicated, according to people familiar with the matter, thanks to strong demand for the stock.】

item.title: 荷兰银行因成本控制和手续费收入实现超预期利润
item.description: 荷兰银行（ABN Amro Bank NV）公布的第一季度利润超出预期，原因是成本控制和费用增加帮助这家荷兰贷款机构抵消了利率下降的影响。【原文：ABN Amro Bank NV reported first-quarter profit that beat expectations, as cost control and higher fees helped the Dutch lender offset the effect of declining interest rates.】

item.title: Fortress 和 Kimmeridge 开设阿布扎比前哨站以寻求交易
item.description: 堡垒投资集团（Fortress Investment Group）和专注于能源的私募股权公司金美利奇（Kimmeridge）正在阿布扎比开设办事处，旨在通过与主权财富基金穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Fortress Investment Group and energy-focused private equity firm Kimmeridge are opening Abu Dhabi offices, aiming to make deals and boost assets by leaning on their ties to sovereign wealth fund Mubadala Investment Co.】

item.title: 随着房地产获得青睐，津巴布韦将出现首个以美元上市的房地产投资信托基金
item.description: 随着对房地产股票需求的增长，津巴布韦本周将迎来首个以美元计价的房地产投资上市。【原文：Zimbabwe will get its first dollar-denominated real estate investment listing this week, as demand for property stocks grow.】

item.title: 默茨公司呼吁废除欧盟供应链法，引发联盟争执
item.description: 德国新总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）再次呼吁欧盟废除旨在促使企业在供应链中奉行可持续发展政策的规定，加倍坚持了这一立场，而这有可能引发他与社会民主党联盟伙伴之间的冲突。【原文：Germany’s new chancellor, Friedrich Merz, reiterated a call for the European Union to scrap rules designed to make companies pursue sustainable policies in their supply chains, doubling down on a position that risks igniting conflict with his Social Democrat coalition partners.】

item.title: CSI 地产公司四年来首次发行美元债券
item.description: 在香港和中国房地产长期低迷的情况下，中证置业有限公司（CSI Properties Ltd. ）将出售四年来的首笔美元债券，此举有可能缓解该建筑商对流动性的担忧。【原文：CSI Properties Ltd. is selling its first dollar bond in four years, a move that could potentially ease liquidity concerns for the builder amid a prolonged real estate slump in Hong Kong and China.】

item.title: 印度 RBI 在出租车应用崩溃后审查部分电子钱包
item.description: 印度最大的全电动汽车出租车服务公司突然倒闭，导致用户无法使用绑定在其账户上的资金，熟悉此事的人士称，印度央行正在仔细审查一些与电动汽车公司相关的数字钱包。【原文：India’s central bank is scrutinizing some digital wallets associated with electric-vehicle players after the sudden collapse of the country’s largest all-EV taxi service left users unable to access money tied to their accounts, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称安哥拉反腐势头减弱
item.description: 国际货币基金组织称，安哥拉总统若昂-卢伦科的反腐行动正在失去动力，威胁到该国的经济增长前景。【原文：Angolan President Joao Lourenco’s anti-corruption drive is losing steam, threatening the country’s economic growth outlook, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 外国人在 2023 年以来最长买入期后抛售印度股票
item.description: 外国人在连续 16 天买入超过 60 亿美元的印度股票后转为卖出，这是两年来最长的连续买入纪录。【原文：Foreigners turned sellers of Indian shares after purchasing more than $6 billion in 16 consecutive days — their longest buying streak in two years.】
